problem_definition.command_line: for layer in 5 10 20 30; do ./generate_mesh $layer; fluidity cdg_cjc.flml; cp cdg.stat cdg-$layer.stat; cp cdg_1.vtu cdg-$layer.vtu; done

variables.variable: import os files = os.listdir("./") solvers_converged = not "matrixdump" in files and not "matrixdump.info" in files

import numpy from fluidity_tools import stat_parser layers = numpy.array([5,10,20,30]) dxs=1.0/layers error=[] for layer in layers: s=stat_parser("cdg-"+`layer`+".stat") error.append((s["Stuff"]['AbsoluteDifference']['l2norm'][-1]))
error=numpy.array(error) convergence=numpy.log(error[:-1]/error[1:])/numpy.log((1.0*layers[1:])/(1.0*layers[:-1])) print error
